name: MIS Nationality Report
description: v1.0 This report lists all prisoners by their nationality. The report prompts the user to select one or more establishments, areas and nationalities.

dataset.name: Nationality
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE <> '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE.CURR_RELEASE_DATE, ( case when ( AT_DIM_HOME_ADDRESSES.LOCALITY ) is null then 'Unknown' else ( AT_DIM_HOME_ADDRESSES.LOCALITY ) end ) || ' - ' || ( case when ( AT_DIM_HOME_ADDRESSES.CITY_DESC ) is null then 'Unknown' else ( AT_DIM_HOME_ADDRESSES.CITY_DESC ) end ) || ' - ' || ( case when ( AT_DIM_HOME_ADDRESSES.COUNTY_DESC ) is null then 'Unknown' else ( AT_DIM_HOME_ADDRESSES.COUNTY_DESC ) end ), AT_DIM_HOME_ADDRESSES.PRIMARY_FLAG FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, (   Select AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK as OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK, case when AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE <> '31/12/9000' Then AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE end as CURR_RELEASE_DATE From --BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE AT_FACT_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_RELEASE_DATE where --AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=AT_FACT_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.RELEASE_CALCULATED_DATE_SK=AT_RELEASE_DATE.DATE_SK(+) and AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.SENTENCE_CURRENT_FLAG='Y' --and AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE !='31/12/9000' ) DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_ADDRESSES AT_DIM_HOME_ADDRESSES WHERE ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK=AT_DOB.DATE_SK ) AND ( AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK ) AND ( AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG='Y' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT  CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID=CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /*= #Variable('BOUSER') */ )) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY')-6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999' ) ) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID=AT_DIM_HOME_ADDRESSES.OFFENDER_ID_NK(+) ) AND ( AT_DIM_HOME_ADDRESSES.OWNER_CLASS='OFF' ) AND ( ( AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */ ) Or 'All' in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */ ) ) AND ( AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Area (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Area',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:68) */ ) Or 'All' in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Area (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Area',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:68) */ ) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION in (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Nationality (All for all)','A','Other Personal Details\Nationality Description',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */ ) Or 'All' in (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Nationality (All for all)','A','Other Personal Details\Nationality Description',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */ ) ) )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: AllPrisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE <> '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END, AT_CELL.UNIT_1_CODE, AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE.CURR_RELEASE_DATE, nvl(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND,'** Incentive Level Missing **') FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_CELL, (   Select AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK as OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK, case when AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE <> '31/12/9000' Then AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE end as CURR_RELEASE_DATE From --BODIMIS.FACT_CASE_SENTENCE AT_FACT_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_RELEASE_DATE where --AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=AT_FACT_SENTENCE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.RELEASE_CALCULATED_DATE_SK=AT_RELEASE_DATE.DATE_SK(+) and AT_FACT_OFFENDER_SENTENCE.SENTENCE_CURRENT_FLAG='Y' --and AT_RELEASE_DATE.DAY_DATE !='31/12/9000' ) DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE WHERE ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK=DT_CURRENT_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK(+) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK=AT_DOB.DATE_SK ) AND ( AT_CELL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( AT_CELL.UNIT_4_SK=AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK ) AND ( AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG='Y' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT  CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID=CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /*= #Variable('BOUSER') */ )) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY')-6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999' ) ) ) AND ( ( AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */ ) Or 'All' in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */ ) ) AND ( AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Area (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Area',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:68) */ ) Or 'All' in (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Establishment Area (All for all)','A','Establishment\Establishment Area',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:68) */ ) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.MIS_CURRENT_RECORD_IND = 'Y' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION in (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Nationality (All for all)','A','Other Personal Details\Nationality Description',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */ ) Or 'All' in (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /*= #Prompt('Nationality (All for all)','A','Other Personal Details\Nationality Description',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:70) */ ) ) )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: IEP
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **') AS IEP_BAND FROM BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6 OR CSL.ENDYEAR = '2999')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT IEP_BAND FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_NATIONLITY_DESC
field.legacySql: =If(IsNull([Nationality Description]);"The Nationalities have not been entered";[Nationality Description])

field.name: $ref:V_NATIONLITY_DESC
field.legacySql: =If(IsNull([Nationality Description]);"The Nationalities have not been entered";[Nationality Description])
